original_title: Mayantha to resign from COPF Chair
original_body_lines: SJB MP Mayantha Dissanayake has decided to resign from the chair of Committee on Public Finance.
Sources close to Dissanayake told Dailly Mirror that he will send in the resignation letter to Speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeywardena next week.
He is also expected to meet Opposition Leader Sajith Premadasa on Monday. (Yohan Perera)
